text: I kogato Ibrakhim reche: “Gospodi moi, stori go zashtiten grad i khrani s plodovete negovite zhiteli - onezi ot tyakh, koito povyarvakha v Allakh i v Setniya den!”, Toi reche: “A koito e nevernik, shte go ostavya malko da se ponaslazhdava, posle shte go podkaram kum muchenieto na Ada. I kolko losha e tazi uchast!”
